page.title: 20GAMES IN THE PLAYGROUND
page.content: There are lots of games played by children in our school,such as off_ ground-touch,Tally-ho,football and chain-he.Chain-he is played by four or more people.One person is it and gives the others 50 to get away.when one person is caught he chains up with that person.He/she can either chain by means of a scarf,or by holding hands. This game can go on for over two hours,according to the amount of people playing. When there are more than four people chaining together you have to make two sets of two's chasing the rest.When everyone has been caught we start a new game.This game is played mostly in winter but occasionly played in the summer, when it is not too hot.On hot days we either walk around the field or sit on the playground talking.
